reviewText: This came in handy on my recent trip to Scotland. I'm glad I purchased and read it before my trip.

I retired from a full career in Naval Aviation and love travel. This travel dvd is great. I love it. I am of Scottish and English ancestors and love Scotland. My clan chieftain lives not too far from Edinburgh so I wanted to know a bit more about the city. I highly recommend this dvd to anyone who enjoys travel and new places.
thanks
Phillip

The videography was good and I enjoyed seeing the main buildings in historic Edinburgh. I wish the video had included the University of Edinburgh, one of the world's great universities, and some residential areas to see how people lived.
